trans-unit.source: Represents a single property in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> class with the specified name and value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>類別具有指定的名稱和值。

trans-unit.source: The property name.
The property value.
Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> references the same XML element as the original.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>參考相同的 XML 項目，與原始。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>

trans-unit.source: Modifications to the name or value of a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.
trans-unit.target: 修改名稱或值的淺層複本將會反映在兩個複本。

trans-unit.source: However, depending on property evaluation, the two copies could have different <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.FinalValue%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 不過，根據屬性評估的兩個複本可能會有不同<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.FinalValue%2A>屬性值。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.FinalValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> can be independently modified.
trans-unit.target: 深層複本<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>會建立新的 XML 項目參考，如此這兩個的複本<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>可以獨立地進行修改。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> </xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create a deep copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要建立的深層複本<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定`Condition`屬性之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定`Condition`屬性之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the final value of the property after all property evaluations have been performed.
trans-unit.target: 執行所有的屬性評估之後，請取得最後一個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The final value of the property after all property evaluations have been performed.
trans-unit.target: 屬性執行所有的屬性評估後的最終值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出屬性是否已匯入專案。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此屬性已匯入專案。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property name.
The property name.
To be added.
To be added.
Returns the string that represents the property <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>.
The string that represents the property <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>.
Gets or sets the property value.
The property value.
